Description: Picture perfect! Yes, this home does have it all! Gut renovated in 2019, this sun-splashed floor thru home has everything the choosiest renter is looking for and more. From the stunning contemporary kitchen with quartz island to the in-unit laundry, central-air, and wonderful closets, the space is welcoming and you feel at home from the minute you walk in the door. Smart technology features a NEST thermostat and Navien tankless hot water heater. The private deck is the ideal outdoor escape and completes the package. Don't be fooled by the square footage, this well designed layout uses every inch perfectly, making it feel and live larger than the square footage indicates. An ideal space for anyone who needs a great working from home space. Just a quick walk to the T, minutes to downtown and immersed in the exciting & thriving Eagle Hill neighborhood, the location is incredible and the value simply outstanding!
